4 Woody Plants For life history, mention common canopy positions - information from Ramage et al. 2017 - dominant canopy are Liriondendron tulipifera (tulip poplar), Carya spp., Quercus spp., Fraxinus americana (white ash), Nyssa sylvatica (black gum) 4.1 Adoxaceae 4.1.1 Sambucus canadensis (American black elderberry) Life history (information will be added by Michael) Leaf traits (written about or scanned and labeled) Annual Recruitment and Mortality #
